ygData.subject: Re: Guard Xyrin and the Quest of Something or Another
ygData.msgSnippet: That last guard is on an island directly across from the Isle of the sisters.  Standing on the dock, facing out, you should just barely see it.  The sentry is
ygData.messageBody:
That last guard is on an island directly across from the Isle of the
sisters. Standing on the dock, facing out, you should just barely
see it. The sentry is sitting on the edge of the island, but be
warned, it is full of mid-level undead, which she says she will help
you defeat when you give her the potion, but she still just sits
there. And btw, Hello all, I am Sirius (in game name of Siruis,
stupid filter....)Mordrake of Mith Marr, guild MoltenLava, pleasure
to make your acquantinces, may Marr guide your paths!


>From: "Ragnarok" <gvragnarok@...>
>Reply-To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqpaladin] Guard Xyrin and the Quest of Something or
Another
>Date: Mon, 19 Apr 1999 12:48:34 -0700
>
>I'd like to introduce myself. My character rather. The name is
Tiresias,
>and right now he's a level 14 Paladin on the Povar server. You
know...
>Povar... You never heard of Povar?! =) He serves Erollisi Marr
24/7. I
>usually hangs around Freeport area... the commonlands, Desert of Ro,
and
>Befallen, smiting evil and whatnot. In any case...
>
>I was wondering if anyone did the quest to look for the last Guard
Xyrin in
>the quest that starts in the Temple of Marr. Is that a beginner's
quest or
>what? Because I got as far as the isle in the Ocean of Tears
talking to all
>the Holy Woman O' Fun and I hear a scream come out of nowhere
yearning for
>help, but I can't find where it's coming from! The nearest islands
have
>goblins I'm not sure I want to mess with... anybody do this one yet?
>
>-Tiresias
>Servant of Erollsi
